entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 in the evening then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
